publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6295 Nicola Sturgeon: NHS Quality Strategyâ€”That the Parliament commends The Healthcare Quality Strategy for NHSScotland as the right approach, at the right time, to delivering the highest quality healthcare to everybody in Scotland, responding to what they want, need and deserve and, through this, to ensuring that the quality of healthcare services across NHS Scotland becomes recognised as among the best in the world. Supported by: Shona Robison*
